Package DiceGame

Class DiceGameManager

java.lang.Object
DiceGame.DiceGameManager
public class DiceGameManager
extends java.lang.Object
DiceGameManager controls and stores the variables required to play the dice game It launches each of the corresponding windows in accordance to what is required when the game is over it will carry on the game if the player wins or enact the penalty if they lose if they can't afford the penalty it will launch the gameOver screen.
Author:
Josef

  • Constructor Summary

    Constructors
    Constructor Description
    DiceGameManager​(GameManager gameManager, Game game, Route route, int handiCap, DiceGame diceGame)
    creates an instance of DiceGameManger

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    void closeLossWindow​(DiceGameLossWindow diceGameLossWindow)
    applies the penalty, if the penalty is too great, the player loses the game closes the loss window if the player loses the game the game over screen is launched if the can afford the penalty they lose their items and arrive at the destination
    void closePirateSummaryWindow()
    closes the pirate summary window then starts playerTurn()
    void closeRolledOneWindow()
    closes the rolled one window starts the pirates turn
    void closeRulesWindow​(DiceGameRulesWindow diceGameRulesWindow)
    closes the rules window then starts the playerTurn function
    void closeSnakeEyesWindow()
    closes the snake eyes window starts the pirates turn
    void closeVictoryWindow()
    closes the victory window arrives the player at their location
    int getHandicap()
    returns the handicap
    int getPenalty()
    returns the penalty that is enacted if the player loses
    int getPirateScore()
    returns the pirates current total score
    int getPlayerScore()
    returns the players current total score
    int getPlayerTurnScore()
    returns the players current turn score
    void launchDiceGameLossWindow()
    launches the lossWindow
    void launchDiceGameRollWindow()
    launches the RollWindow
    void launchDiceGameRulesWindow()
    launches the rules window
    void launchPirateSummaryWindow()
    launches the pirate summary window
    void launchRolledOneWindow()
    launches the rolled one window
    void launchSnakeEyesWindow()
    launches the snake eyes Window
    void makePenalty()
    generates a random number between 750 and 250 this is used as the gold taken if the player loses the dice game
    void passTurn()
    this is the only time the players total score increases as you must lock in your turn score by ending your turn closes the rollWindow then starts the pirates turn
    void pirateTurn()
    calls to the DiceGame.PirateTurn to create a new pirate score based on the one input into the function then passes back to the players turn unless the pirate has reached the score threshold
    void playerTurn()
    Calls to the DiceGame.then alters the players turn and total values based on the string returned.
    void reRoll()
    closes the roll window and starts the playerTurn function again

    Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

    equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

  • Constructor Details

    • DiceGameManager

      public DiceGameManager​(GameManager gameManager, Game game, Route route, int handiCap, DiceGame diceGame)
      creates an instance of DiceGameManger
      Parameters:
      gameManager - the gameManager this belongs to
      game - the game this belongs to
      route - the route the player was on when they were attacked
      handiCap - sets the floor of the player score
      diceGame - the dice game instance that belongs to this one

  • Method Details

    • getHandicap

      public int getHandicap()
      returns the handicap
      Returns:
      int, handicap

    • getPlayerScore

      public int getPlayerScore()
      returns the players current total score
      Returns:

      public int getPlayerTurnScore()

      Returns:

    • getPirateScore

      public int getPirateScore()
      returns the pirates current total score
      Returns:
      int, pirates score

    • playerTurn

      public void playerTurn()
      Calls to the DiceGame.then alters the players turn and total values based on the string returned. it then calls the next function

    • pirateTurn

      public void pirateTurn()
      calls to the DiceGame.PirateTurn to create a new pirate score based on the one input into the function then passes back to the players turn unless the pirate has reached the score threshold

    • makePenalty

      public void makePenalty()
      generates a random number between 750 and 250 this is used as the gold taken if the player loses the dice game

    • getPenalty

      public int getPenalty()
      returns the penalty that is enacted if the player loses
      Returns:
      int, value of goods stolen if the player loses

    • launchDiceGameRulesWindow

      public void launchDiceGameRulesWindow()
      launches the rules window

      Parameters:
      diceGameRulesWindow - instance of the rulesWindow it is starting

      public void passTurn()

    • closeLossWindow

      public void closeLossWindow​(DiceGameLossWindow diceGameLossWindow)
      applies the penalty, if the penalty is too great, the player loses the game closes the loss window if the player loses the game the game over screen is launched if the can afford the penalty they lose their items and arrive at the destination
      Parameters:
      diceGameLossWindow - , the window that belongs to this instance of diceGameManage
